This decision stems from concerns over India's high tariffs, non-monetary trade barriers, and continued reliance on Russia for energy and military equipment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-frustrated-with-india-trade-talks-us-president-feels-25-tariff-will-remedy-the-situation-says-adviser-additional-penalty-for-russia-trade-shortly/articleshow/123001828.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-frustrated-with-india-trade-talks-us-president-feels-25-tariff-will-remedy-the-situation-says-adviser-additional-penalty-for-russia-trade-shortly/articleshow/123001828.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 21:19:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32128" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123001956,imgsize-32128.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bharat mata ki jai': India stand firm, refuse to face Pakistan in WCL semifinal</title><description><![CDATA[The Yuvraj Singh-led India Champions have refused to play Pakistan in the World Championship of Legends semifinals, mirroring their earlier group-stage boycott. This decision, supported by legends like Shikhar Dhawan and Harbhajan Singh, stems from the Pahalgam terror attack. An insider emphasised the team's unwavering commitment to the nation, echoing Dhawan's sentiment that the country comes first.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bharat-mata-ki-jai-india-stand-firm-refuse-to-face-pakistan-in-wcl-semifinal/articleshow/123002407.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bharat-mata-ki-jai-india-stand-firm-refuse-to-face-pakistan-in-wcl-semifinal/articleshow/123002407.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 21:55:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46554" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123002411,imgsize-46554.cms"/></item><item><title>Britain's airspace shut: All outbound UK flights grounded by 'technical issue'</title><description><![CDATA[A technical issue at the UK's National Air Traffic Services (Nats) caused airspace closure across the country on Wednesday evening. Engineers have successfully restored the affected system, and normal operations are resuming in the London area. Nats is collaborating with airlines and airports to minimize disruption and apologizes for the inconvenience.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/london-airspace-shut-all-outbound-uk-flights-hit-by-air-traffic-control-technical-issue/articleshow/123001847.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/london-airspace-shut-all-outbound-uk-flights-hit-by-air-traffic-control-technical-issue/articleshow/123001847.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 21:11:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47330" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123001882,imgsize-47330.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will take all steps to secure national interest': Centre hits back at Trump's 25% tariff</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-imposes-25-tariff-will-take-all-steps-to-secure-national-interest-says-centre/articleshow/123001356.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-imposes-25-tariff-will-take-all-steps-to-secure-national-interest-says-centre/articleshow/123001356.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 20:38:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1037724" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123001350,imgsize-1037724.cms"/></item><item><title>Mhatre to lead India U19 in Australia; 14-yr-old Suryavanshi retains spot</title><description><![CDATA[Ayush Mhatre will captain India U19 in Australia, starting September 21, for a multi-format tour. The squad includes 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi, known for his impressive performances in England. The team will play three Youth ODIs and two multi-day games, carrying forward the core group that excelled in England, where Mhatre and Suryavanshi shone with their batting prowess.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ind-vs-aus-ayush-mhatre-to-lead-india-u19-in-australia-14-year-old-vaibhav-suryavanshi-retains-spot-after-record-breaking-england-tour/articleshow/123002672.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ind-vs-aus-ayush-mhatre-to-lead-india-u19-in-australia-14-year-old-vaibhav-suryavanshi-retains-spot-after-record-breaking-england-tour/articleshow/123002672.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 22:12:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1498792" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123002688,imgsize-1498792.cms"/></item><item><title>Astronomer CEO Pete De Joy: To all of our employees at Astronomer; it's time for ...</title><description><![CDATA[Following a viral video involving its former CEO, Astronomer's current CEO, Pete DeJoy, has lauded his team's resilience. Amidst the controversy, the company hired Gwyneth Paltrow as a temporary spokesperson, releasing a humorous promotional clip. DeJoy expressed gratitude for his employees' dedication and thanked Maximum Effort for their work with Paltrow.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/astronomer-ceo-pete-de-joy-to-all-of-our-employees-at-astronomer-its-time-for-us-now-to-/articleshow/122967954.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/astronomer-ceo-pete-de-joy-to-all-of-our-employees-at-astronomer-its-time-for-us-now-to-/articleshow/122967954.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 11:36:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="11686" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122967948,imgsize-11686.cms"/></item><item><title>'Insult' vs 'irony': How Op Sindoor debate came to a fiery end </title><description><![CDATA[The Rajya Sabha saw disruptions during Amit Shah's response on Operation Sindoor. Opposition members demanded Prime Minister Narendra Modi's presence. They protested India's cross-border strikes after the Pahalgam terror attack. Shah mentioned Operation Mahadev, where three terrorists were killed. Opposition MPs staged a walkout, insisting on a response from the Prime Minister. Jairam Ramesh criticized Modi's absence from the debate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/insult-vs-irony-fiery-end-to-operation-sindoor-debate-as-kharge-shah-trade-barbs-over-pm-modis-presence/articleshow/123000629.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/insult-vs-irony-fiery-end-to-operation-sindoor-debate-as-kharge-shah-trade-barbs-over-pm-modis-presence/articleshow/123000629.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 19:42:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="54772" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123000709,imgsize-54772.cms"/></item><item><title>'Very aggressive with curators': Ex-BCCI umpire recalls Gambhir's previous 'fight'</title><description><![CDATA[Gautam Gambhir's reported clash with The Oval's curator has stirred memories of a similar incident from 2014, when he argued with a Delhi curator over pitch conditions before a Vijay Hazare Trophy match. Marcus Couto, a former BCCI umpire, recalled Gambhir's aggressive behavior then.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/gautam-gambhir-vs-the-oval-curator-ex-bcci-umpire-couto-recalls-gambhirs-previous-fight-in-domestic-match-he-was-very-aggressive-with-curators/articleshow/123002150.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/gautam-gambhir-vs-the-oval-curator-ex-bcci-umpire-couto-recalls-gambhirs-previous-fight-in-domestic-match-he-was-very-aggressive-with-curators/articleshow/123002150.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 21:45:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV GUPTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70826" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123002181,imgsize-70826.cms"/></item><item><title>Solar Eclipse on Aug 2: The whole 'world to go dark for six minutes'</title><description><![CDATA[Contrary to viral claims, the world won't experience a six-minute blackout on August 2, 2025. NASA confirms a total solar eclipse will occur on August 2, 2027, darkening parts of Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/solar-eclipse-that-will-see-the-world-to-go-dark-for-six-minutes-on-august-2-what-nasas-update-says/articleshow/122970807.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/solar-eclipse-that-will-see-the-world-to-go-dark-for-six-minutes-on-august-2-what-nasas-update-says/articleshow/122970807.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Jul 2025 13:38:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1456151" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122970788,imgsize-1456151.cms"/></item><item><title>Op Sindoor debate: BJP claims 'Indira Gandhi sought US help to end 1971 war'</title><description><![CDATA[Bharatiya Janata Party MPs criticized Rahul Gandhi's remarks on Operation Sindoor in Lok Sabha. They alleged Indira Gandhi requested US assistance during the 1971 war with Pakistan. BJP members cited a letter from Indira Gandhi to Richard Nixon. They claimed Congress distorted history and questioned Indira Gandhi's trust in the armed forces.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-sindoor-debate-bjp-claims-indira-gandhi-sought-us-help-to-end-1971-war-hits-back-at-rahul-gandhis-political-will-remark/articleshow/122999405.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-sindoor-debate-bjp-claims-indira-gandhi-sought-us-help-to-end-1971-war-hits-back-at-rahul-gandhis-political-will-remark/articleshow/122999405.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 18:33:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="962420" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122999499,imgsize-962420.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump announces 25% tariff on India, 'plus penalty' for buying energy & arms from Russia</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump announced India will face a 25% tariff starting August 1st, along with penalties for energy and arms purchases from Russia. Trump cited high Indian tariffs and trade barriers, as well as continued reliance on Russian resources, as justification. The reciprocal tariffs for other countries will be effective August 1, 2025, according to Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-trump-announces-25-tariff-on-india-plus-penalty-for-buying-energy-and-arms-from-russia/articleshow/122998698.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-trump-announces-25-tariff-on-india-plus-penalty-for-buying-energy-and-arms-from-russia/articleshow/122998698.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:46:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="290030" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122999591,imgsize-290030.cms"/></item><item><title>Six investors finalise The Hundred deal with ECB; two more to sign up in October</title><description><![CDATA[The England and Wales Cricket Board has finalised deals with "six strategic partners" for The Hundred, injecting over £500 million into English and Welsh cricket, including £50 million for grassroots development. These partnerships mark a historic moment, making The Hundred the first UK sports competition to secure franchise partnerships of this scale.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/six-investors-finalise-the-hundred-deal-with-ecb-two-more-to-sign-up-in-october/articleshow/123000536.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/six-investors-finalise-the-hundred-deal-with-ecb-two-more-to-sign-up-in-october/articleshow/123000536.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 21:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="10500" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123001494,imgsize-10500.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk corrects 'hiring post' of xAI's Aditya Gupta; says: Starting today...</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk's xAI is doing away with the title "researcher," opting for "engineer" for all technical roles, a decision prompted by Musk's direct intervention on X. This move aims to eliminate what Musk sees as a two-tiered system, aligning xAI with companies like OpenAI and Anthropic that favor unified technical titles.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-corrects-hiring-post-of-xais-aditya-gupta-says-starting-today-there-are-only-engineers-/articleshow/122990990.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-corrects-hiring-post-of-xais-aditya-gupta-says-starting-today-there-are-only-engineers-/articleshow/122990990.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:05:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122990962,imgsize-17544.cms"/></item><item><title>'Were you sleeping in history class?' Jaishankar defended his China visit, asserting transparency and contrasting it with alleged secret meetings by others during the 2008 Beijing Olympics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/were-you-sleeping-in-history-class-jaishankars-china-guru-dig-at-rahul-slams-gandhi-family/articleshow/122997913.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/were-you-sleeping-in-history-class-jaishankars-china-guru-dig-at-rahul-slams-gandhi-family/articleshow/122997913.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:19:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51504" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122998080,imgsize-51504.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Shubman Gill eyes milestone after matching Bradman-Gavaskar feat</title><description><![CDATA[India skipper Shubman Gill is on the cusp of reaching 6,000 international runs as Team India prepares to face England in the decisive fifth and final Test. This message subtly responds to past concerns raised by Gisele Bündchen and the recent Netflix roast, emphasizing that actions reflect priorities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/tom-brady-blames-football-sacrifices-for-family-rift-in-emotional-letter-takes-veiled-shot-at-gisele-bndchen/articleshow/122985293.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/tom-brady-blames-football-sacrifices-for-family-rift-in-emotional-letter-takes-veiled-shot-at-gisele-bndchen/articleshow/122985293.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 05:36:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60202" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122985377,imgsize-60202.cms"/></item><item><title>NHL: Nazem Kadri could join Montreal Canadiens; Toronto Maple Leafs move blocked</title><description><![CDATA[Nazem Kadri might be heading to the Montreal Canadiens as Calgary reportedly refuses trades with Toronto. Friction from Brad Treliving's past dealings with Calgary limits Kadri's options. Montreal, with its young core and skilled system, presents an appealing destination for the veteran center, potentially stabilizing their second line and providing valuable leadership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/nhl-trade-rumors-nazem-kadri-could-join-montreal-canadiens-after-toronto-maple-leafs-blocked-by-calgary-flames/articleshow/122983328.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/nhl-trade-rumors-nazem-kadri-could-join-montreal-canadiens-after-toronto-maple-leafs-blocked-by-calgary-flames/articleshow/122983328.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 01:12:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="502157" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122983326,imgsize-502157.cms"/></item><item><title>Linda Hogan’s bold claim: Brooke won’t attend Hulk’s funeral; family rift resurfaces</title><description><![CDATA[In a shocking turn, Linda Hogan posted a video alleging Brooke Hogan wouldn't attend Hulk Hogan's funeral, citing past trauma and family issues. General Manager Stan Bowman is giving McDavid space but plans to discuss the matter soon. McDavid's decision is crucial for the Oilers' Stanley Cup aspirations and will significantly impact the team's future roster and the NHL landscape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-contract-update-stan-bowman-gives-oilers-fans-hope-amid-extension-uncertainty/articleshow/122997850.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-contract-update-stan-bowman-gives-oilers-fans-hope-amid-extension-uncertainty/articleshow/122997850.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50058" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122997942,imgsize-50058.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | 'Don't understand the fuss': Gill breaks silence on Gambhir-curator spat</title><description><![CDATA[Tensions flared ahead of the crucial fifth Test at The Oval as India captain Shubman Gill addressed a controversy involving head coach Gautam Gambhir and curator Lee Fortis over pitch access. With England leading the series 2-1, the final Test is poised to be a dramatic conclusion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dont-understand-what-the-fuss-was-about-shubman-gill-breaks-silence-on-gautam-gambhir-curator-spat-at-the-oval/articleshow/122998339.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dont-understand-what-the-fuss-was-about-shubman-gill-breaks-silence-on-gautam-gambhir-curator-spat-at-the-oval/articleshow/122998339.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:32:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAHIL MALHOTRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32190" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122998345,imgsize-32190.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump's 25% tariff on India: What next for India-US trade talks? He contrasted the UPA government's response with the current government's actions. Nadda highlighted specific attacks and the perceived lack of action under the previous administration. Residents claim construction and tree cutting contributed to the wall's instability, leading to the fatal collapse.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhis-safdarjung-hospital-flooded-after-heavy-rains-patients-wade-through-ankle-deep-water-watch/articleshow/122998471.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhis-safdarjung-hospital-flooded-after-heavy-rains-patients-wade-through-ankle-deep-water-watch/articleshow/122998471.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:38:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="648457" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122998455,imgsize-648457.cms"/></item><item><title>'Feels like fiction': Jaya turns 'film critic' during Op Sindoor debate</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/feels-like-fiction-jaya-bachchan-turns-film-critic-in-operation-sindoor-debate-congratulates-centre-for-writers-who-coin-grand-names/articleshow/122996523.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/feels-like-fiction-jaya-bachchan-turns-film-critic-in-operation-sindoor-debate-congratulates-centre-for-writers-who-coin-grand-names/articleshow/122996523.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 16:13:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1197048" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122996505,imgsize-1197048.cms"/></item><item><title>Friendship Day: Wishes, messages, quotes, captions, to make your buddy feel special</title><description><![CDATA[International Friendship Day, established by the UN in 2011 and observed on July 30th, celebrates the cherished bonds of friendship. Despite this, he remains a key bowler, tied with Siraj for most wickets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-jasprit-bumrah-in-or-out-shubman-gill-gives-crucial-update-on-star-pacer-ahead-of-5th-test/articleshow/122998184.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-jasprit-bumrah-in-or-out-shubman-gill-gives-crucial-update-on-star-pacer-ahead-of-5th-test/articleshow/122998184.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 17:26:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAHIL MALHOTRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35700" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122998281,imgsize-35700.cms"/></item><item><title>'Some people uncomfortable with history': Jaishankar slams Cong in RS over IWT</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar addressed the Rajya Sabha on Operation Sindoor, following the Pahalgam terror attack. Jaishankar refuted claims of US mediation for a ceasefire between India and Pakistan.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/some-people-are-uncomfortable-with-history-jaishankar-slams-congress-in-rajya-sabha-over-iwt-top-quotes/articleshow/122993509.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/some-people-are-uncomfortable-with-history-jaishankar-slams-congress-in-rajya-sabha-over-iwt-top-quotes/articleshow/122993509.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 14:17:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="915816" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122993606,imgsize-915816.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | 'Uneven gaps': Stokes slams scheduling after injury rules him out</title><description><![CDATA[Ben Stokes' shoulder injury sidelines him for the final Test against India, prompting him to criticise the series' demanding schedule and inconsistent gaps between matches. Filers must also provide detailed disclosures on TDS sections and deductions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/financial-literacy/taxation/itr-3-live-for-online-filing-income-tax-form-covers-business-and-professional-income-earners-directors-and-traders-key-things-to-know-before-filing-for-ay-202526/articleshow/122991253.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/financial-literacy/taxation/itr-3-live-for-online-filing-income-tax-form-covers-business-and-professional-income-earners-directors-and-traders-key-things-to-know-before-filing-for-ay-202526/articleshow/122991253.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 12:58:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="150745" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122992171,imgsize-150745.cms"/></item><item><title>Another dog named Dogesh Babu’s residence certificate application raises eyebrows</title><description><![CDATA[A bizarre incident occurred in Bihar.       <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <title><![CDATA[RBI won the battle against inflation, but the war continues: Sanjay Malhotra]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/rbi-won-the-battle-against-inflation-but-the-war-continues-sanjay-malhotra-19642331.htm]]></link>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years. That deadline expires this September.]]></description>
